title: UK Should Invest in Energy Over Rail For Growth Boost, BCG Says
description: UK ministers should focus their investment splurge on energy and digital infrastructure rather than road and rail in order to get the biggest boost to economic growth, according to new research.
content: UK ministers should focus their investment splurge on energy and digital infrastructure rather than road and rail in order to get the biggest boost to economic growth, according to new research.
